thread.title: Kim Jong-un invites the world to nuclear site shutdown

title: Kim Jong-un invites the world to nuclear site shutdown
text:
Kim Jong-un invites the world to nuclear site shutdown 11:16am EDT - 01:51
North Korean Kim Jong-un has invited experts and journalists to witness the dismantling of a nuclear test site, following the first inter-Korean summit in more than a decade. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
North Korean Kim Jong-un has invited experts and journalists to witness the dismantling of a nuclear test site, following the first inter-Korean summit in more than a decade.
